summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Spectrum Unite platform. Backend APIs 100% functional, frontend working with proper Disability Pride Flag theme, authentication, and core features.

integration_issues.issue: Messages page may not be fully implemented - basic page loads but functionality unclear

passed_tests: API Health Check - all 22 backend endpoints working
Landing page with correct Disability Pride Flag theme
Dashboard with stats, quick links, and disability badges
Forums page navigation and search functionality
Service Directory page with search and filtering
Events page with search and virtual event filtering
Form field rendering and basic interactions
